content.rendered:
Grab your free Peer Selection Guidebook

Learn the techniques to help you value your business. How can you select peer companies to compare against? Find out in our guide




    By clicking, I acknowledge receipt of the Valutico.com privacy policy

    Grab your free whitepaper now to learn how to:

    Select Peers that make sense

    Most of the time choosing peers within the same industry is a good starting point, but that’s not enough by itself to get an accurate peer group

    Pay Attention to the Right Multiples

    Should you pay closer attention to P/E or EV/EBITDA? Learn why these differences matter and how to select the most useful metric for the company in question.

    Think “Outside the Box” in Small, Niche Industries

    Finding similar peers in smaller, niche industries is not as easy as in mature ones. We explain the techniques practitioners should use in these scenarios.
